title: Plot Twist!

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Switch the target of your execution.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are executed, you must swap the kill from yourself to someone who voted guilty on your trial.
- If you do not choose, a target will be chosen for you.
- Once you are executed and swap the kill, you can no longer be voted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be executed and switch the kill to someone else.

desc:
Post 448
*"Surprise! The Legend got executed instead!"*
